    • updateMap

      public void updateMap​(MapVM mapVM) throws java.io.IOException
      Sends an updated mapVM to the clients
      Parameters:
      mapVM - mapVM sent to the client
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing stream header

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(java.lang.String player)
      Removes a player from both color and gods map after the elimination of the player from the game
      Parameters:
      player - the eliminated player's username

    • moveInput

      public void moveInput​(java.lang.String player, java.util.List<Coords> checkMoveCells, boolean error) throws java.io.IOException
      Sends to the player's client a MessageCV representing a move input request
      Parameters:
      player - player username
      checkMoveCells - list of legal coords that can be selected by the client for the move
      error - notifies the client that this message is sent due to a previous input error
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing stream header

    • buildInput

      public void buildInput​(java.lang.String player, java.util.List<Coords> checkBuildCells, boolean error) throws java.io.IOException
      Sends to the player's client a MessageCV representing a build input request
      Parameters:
      player - player username
      checkBuildCells - list of legal coords that can be selected by the client for the build
      error - notifies the client that this message is sent due to a previous input error
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing stream header

    • godInput

      public void godInput​(java.lang.String player, java.util.List<java.lang.String> chosenGods, boolean error) throws java.io.IOException
      Sends to the player's client a MessageCV representing a god input request and also a message to the opponents informing them the player is selecting his god. Otherwise, it sends one message to player informing him which god the server assigns him , when only one god remains
      Parameters:
      player - player username
      chosenGods - list of gods chosen by the challenger among which the player can choose his god
      error - notifies the client that this message is sent due to a previous input error
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing stream header

    • builderSetUpInput

      public void builderSetUpInput​(java.lang.String player, boolean callNumber, boolean error) throws java.io.IOException
      Sends to the player's client a MessageCV representing a builder setup input request
      Parameters:
      player - player username
      callNumber - true if is the first request (requests with error excluded)
      error - notifies the client that this message is sent due to a previous input error
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing stream header

    • godSelectionInput

      public void godSelectionInput​(java.lang.String challenger, java.util.List<java.lang.String> godsList, int godsNumber, boolean error) throws java.io.IOException
      Sends to the player's client a MessageCV representing a god selection input request. Sends also a message to the opponents informing them the challenger is selecting the gods
      Parameters:
      challenger - challenger player username
      godsList - list of all gods
      godsNumber - number of gods he has to choose
      error - notifies the client that this message is sent due to a previous input error
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing stream header

    • effectInput

      public void effectInput​(java.lang.String player, java.lang.String god) throws java.io.IOException
      Sends to the player's client a MessageCV representing a "useEffect" request
      Parameters:
      player - player username
      god - name of the player's god
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing stream header
